@mctumorface @davidsirota You imply I'm defending them. I'm not. My argument is akin to "the enemy of my enemy is my friend". Seems from the defensive swagger and sarcasm of this bullshit response you can defeat an enemy single handed. You certainly don't know how to create allies.

@davidsirota No. It doesn’t. It gives the country a bigger pool of common allies and windows to have conversations to move us out of ‘cut our nose off’ territory... that left us with sanity and math off the table
@davidsirota Totally agree. There’s no reason for the bending over backwards to appear ‘unbiased’. It’s okay to be biased against nazis and corruption.

@davidsirota Why are you worrying about war crimes when a politician gave a politician's wife a cough drop? This should give you such a huge bipartisan civility boner that all the brain leaves your head and you forget trivial stuff like illegal wars and torture.
@davidsirota Refried resistance!!
@davidsirota That's because corporate America decides whose voices are heard on the mainstream media insuring the range of political debate is from far-right to center-right.

@TXFartingsworth @davidsirota The real enemies are also conservatives like Kristol or Bush, at least for anyone actually on the left. And fortunately the percent of "anti-Trump Republicans" is trivial and not worth pursuing electorally; they're just heavily over-represented in the media.

@davidsirota Whose woke folks? #McResistance is the new narrative to get you in line for the same corporatist Dems who elected Trump! #DemExit #GreenEnter #GreenParty is not just an alternative, it’s the imperative.

@carstarr6 @davidsirota No it won't. The percent of conservatives who might vote for a Democrat is tiny and far smaller than the percent of potential voters on the left who currently choose not to vote.
@davidsirota @caitoz I'll agree with you!

@davidsirota Resistance? You mean obstructionists! Big difference between the two.

@IGetItKid @davidsirota If US LE do their jobs there won't be a Republican or Democrat party. We will not see change until we as a people stop being blind to   the corruption of the party we identify with. They use that blindness to keep us fighting each other and not fighting for change.
